title: Leblanc ridiculous survivability with 5 escapes be like
body:
Yes i said 5 if you count correctly

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11112/111121692/4469437-6342065862-tumbl.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Skeletons Grave,realm=NA,application-id=yrc23zHg,discussion-id=EmRwB7pv,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2018-11-08T18:48:38.870+0000)
>
> When chasing LB
> 
> 1 Will she dash away?
> 2 Will she dash away then after i chase dash back?
> 3 Will she dash away and if i chase dash again?
> 4 Will she dash away and if i chase dash again then dash back to point 1
> 5 Will she dash away and if i chase dash again then dash back to point 2
> 6 Will she chain me and walk away?
> 7 Will i somehow provide enough gap closers and pressure to get her to flash?
> 8 If i somehow due catch her, will i be able to finish her off after she gets free stealth and a clone?
> 9 Will she just turn and 1 combo me in .25 secs?
> 10 Dammit why didnt i just ban this trash?

> [{quoted}](name=jocomotion,realm=NA,application-id=yrc23zHg,discussion-id=EmRwB7pv,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2018-11-10T20:15:06.034+0000)
>
> Will she dash?
> Will she dash then dash again?
> Will she double dash, then blink back to the second dash?
> Will she double dash, and then blink to the second dash then the first?
> Will she double dash, double blink, then tether me?
> Will she double dash, double blink, tether me, then poof away with passive?
> Will she double dash, double blink, tether, poof, then kill me?
> Will she double dash, double blink, tether, poof, kill me, then flash?
> Will she double dash, double blink, tether, poof, kill me, flash, then have her dash be off cooldown to dash again?
> Will she double dash, double blink, tether, poof, kill me, flash, dash again, then blink back again?
> 
> Maybe then ~~I~~ my still living teammate may kill her.
